EmailTemplate.name: CorporatePay Team Member Role Reassignment Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Account Team Member Change Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.OwnerFirstName},
{!Account.LastModifiedBy} has requested a new Account Team Member Role for {!Account.Team_Member_Name__c}, who is part of the Account Team for Account {!Account.Name} in Salesforce.
Please assign them to the role {!Account.New_Team_Member_Role__c}.
If you need to ask for further information, you can reply to this email to this email, to email them directly.
If there are any issues with this email please contact your Salesforce Administrator
